Settings.QueryText: SELECT TasksByExecutive.Ref, TasksByExecutive.DeletionMark, TasksByExecutive.Number, TasksByExecutive.Date, TasksByExecutive.BusinessProcess, TasksByExecutive.RoutePoint, TasksByExecutive.Description, TasksByExecutive.Executed, TasksByExecutive.DueDate, CASE WHEN TasksByExecutive.StartDate = &BlankDate THEN &BegOfDay ELSE TasksByExecutive.StartDate END AS StartDate, TasksByExecutive.CompletionDate, TasksByExecutive.Importance, TasksByExecutive.Details, TasksByExecutive.PerformerRole, TasksByExecutive.Performer, TasksByExecutive.Presentation, TasksByExecutive.SubjectString, TasksByExecutive.Author, TasksByExecutive.AcceptedForExecution, CASE WHEN TasksByExecutive.Importance = VALUE(Enum.TaskImportanceOptions.Low) THEN 0 WHEN TasksByExecutive.Importance = VALUE(Enum.TaskImportanceOptions.High) THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS ImportancePicture, TasksByExecutive.Topic, CASE WHEN TasksByExecutive.DueDate <= &CurrentDate THEN &Overdue WHEN TasksByExecutive.DueDate > &CurrentDate AND TasksByExecutive.DueDate <= &EndOfDay THEN &Today WHEN TasksByExecutive.DueDate > &EndOfDay AND TasksByExecutive.DueDate <= &EndOfWeek THEN &ThisWeek WHEN TasksByExecutive.DueDate > &EndOfWeek AND TasksByExecutive.DueDate <= &EndOfNextWeek THEN &NextWeek ELSE &Later END AS GroupDueDate FROM Task.PerformerTask.TasksByExecutive AS TasksByExecutive WHERE TasksByExecutive.BusinessProcessState = VALUE(Enum.BusinessProcessStates.Active)
